vote.title: Reappointment of Stephen S. Brooks, Chief Financial Officer, Physicians First Leasing LLC, 3400 Olentangy River Road, Columbus, OH 43202, to serve as a joint City of Columbus-Franklin County appointee on the Columbus-Franklin County Finance Authority Board of Directors, with a new term expiration date of April 30, 2029 (resume attached).
